member.name: T:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Legacy
member.summary: Utility class with factory methods to create legacy LZ4 (lz4net) compression and decompression streams.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Legacy.Encode(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: true if high compression should be used, false otherwise.
Indicates if inner stream should be left open after compression.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Legacy.Decode(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Indicates if inner stream should be left open after decompression.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Legacy.Wrap(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Compresses and wraps given input byte buffer.
member.exception: inputBuffer size of inputLength is invalid

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Legacy.WrapHC(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Compresses (with high compression algorithm) and wraps given input byte buffer.
member.exception: inputBuffer size of inputLength is invalid

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Legacy.Unwrap(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Unwraps the specified compressed buffer.
member.exception: inputBuffer size is invalid or inputBuffer size is invalid or has been corrupted

member.name: T:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream
member.summary: Block compression stream. Allows to use LZ4 for stream compression.

member.name: T:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.ChunkFlags
member.summary: Flags of a chunk. Please note, this

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.ChunkFlags.None
member.summary: None.

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.ChunkFlags.Compressed
member.summary: Set if chunk is compressed.

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.ChunkFlags.HighCompression
member.summary: Set if high compression has been selected (does not affect decoder, but might be useful when rewriting)

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.ChunkFlags.Passes
member.summary: 3 bits for number of passes. Currently only 1 pass (value 0) is supported.

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream._innerStream
member.summary: The inner stream.

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream._compressionMode
member.summary: The compression mode.

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream._highCompression
member.summary: The high compression flag (compression only).

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream._interactiveRead
member.summary: Determines if reading tries to return something ASAP or wait for full chunk (decompression only).

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream._isolateInnerStream
member.summary: Isolates inner stream which will not be closed when this stream is closed.

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream._blockSize
member.summary: The block size (compression only).

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream._buffer
member.summary: The buffer.

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream._bufferLength
member.summary: The buffer length (can be different then _buffer.Length).

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream._bufferOffset
member.summary: The offset in a buffer.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4StreamMode,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: if set to true high compression is used.

if set to true interactive read mode is used. It means that method tries to return data as soon as possible. Please note, that this should be default behavior but has been made optional for backward compatibility. This constructor will be changed in next major release.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4StreamMode,K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4StreamFlags,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.NotSupported(System.String)
member.summary: Returns NotSupportedException.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.EndOfStream
member.summary: Returns EndOfStreamException.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.TryReadVarInt(System.UInt64@)
member.summary: Tries to read variable length int.
member.returns: true if integer has been read, false if end of stream has been encountered. If end of stream has been encountered in the middle of value is thrown.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.ReadVarInt
member.summary: Reads the variable length int. Work with assumption that value is in the stream and throws exception if it isn't. If you want to check if value is in the stream use instead.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.ReadBlock(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads the block of bytes. Contrary to does not read partial data if possible. If there is no data (yet) it waits.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.WriteVarInt(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Writes the variable length integer.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.FlushCurrentChunk
member.summary: Flushes current chunk.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.AcquireNextChunk
member.summary: Reads the next chunk from stream.
member.returns: true if next has been read, or false if it is legitimate end of file. Throws if end of stream was unexpected.

member.name: P:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.CanRead
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports reading.
member.returns: true if the stream supports reading; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.CanSeek
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports seeking.
member.returns: true if the stream supports seeking; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.CanWrite
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports writing.
member.returns: true if the stream supports writing; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.Flush
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, clears all buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.

member.name: P:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.Length
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the length in bytes of the stream.
member.returns: A long value representing the length of the stream in bytes.

member.name: P:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.Position
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the position within the current stream.
member.returns: The current position within the stream.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.ReadByte
member.summary: Reads a byte from the stream and advances the position within the stream by one byte, or returns -1 if at the end of the stream.
member.returns: The unsigned byte cast to an Int32, or -1 if at the end of the stream.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.param: An array of bytes. When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between and ( + - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
The zero-based byte offset in at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.Seek(System.Int64,System.IO.SeekOrigin)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, sets the position within the current stream.
member.param: A byte offset relative to the parameter.
A value of type indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.
member.returns: The new position within the current stream.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.SetLength(System.Int64)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, sets the length of the current stream.
member.param: The desired length of the current stream in bytes.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.WriteByte(System.Byte)
member.summary: Writes a byte to the current position in the stream and advances the position within the stream by one byte.
member.param: The byte to write to the stream.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream and advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written.
member.param: An array of bytes. This method copies bytes from to the current stream.
The zero-based byte offset in at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
The number of bytes to be written to the current stream.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Stream.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4StreamFlags
member.summary: Additional flags for LZ4Stream.

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4StreamFlags.None
member.summary: Empty settings. No special behavior.

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4StreamFlags.InteractiveRead
member.summary: Allows to use interactive mode, possibly returning partial blocks.

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4StreamFlags.HighCompression
member.summary: Uses high compression version of algorithm.

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4StreamFlags.IsolateInnerStream
member.summary: Isolates inner stream so it does not get closed when LZ4 stream is closed.

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4StreamFlags.Default
member.summary: Default settings.

member.name: T:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4StreamMode
member.summary: Originally this type comes from System.IO.Compression, but it is not present in portable assemblies.

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4StreamMode.Compress
member.summary: Compress

member.name: F:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4StreamMode.Decompress
member.summary: Decompress

member.name: T:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Wrapper
member.summary: Legacy pickler for LZ4. Do not use unless you have dependency on some old data.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Wrapper.Poke32(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Sets uint32 value in byte buffer.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Wrapper.Peek32(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets uint32 from byte buffer.

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Wrapper.Wrap(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Compresses and wraps given input byte buffer.
member.param: if set to true uses high compression.
member.exception: inputBuffer size of inputLength is invalid

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Wrapper.Wrap(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Compresses and wraps given input byte buffer.
member.exception: inputBuffer size of inputLength is invalid

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Wrapper.WrapHC(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Compresses (with high compression algorithm) and wraps given input byte buffer.
member.exception: inputBuffer size of inputLength is invalid

member.name: M:K4os.Compression.LZ4.Legacy.LZ4Wrapper.Unwrap(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Unwraps the specified compressed buffer.
member.exception: inputBuffer size is invalid or inputBuffer size is invalid or has been corrupted
